body:
Try the following:
```
spack env foo create
spack env foo add py-six^python@3.5.2
spack env foo concretize
spack env foo list -lIr
```
The output gives `python@2.7`, not the `python@3.5.2` that was requested:
```
$ spack env foo list -lIr
```
